StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_MIUpdateInspectMedicalExam]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@MarineCandidateID int, @MedicalExamDate varchar(20), @MEPSIDCode char(3), @Height int, @Weight int, @MedicalDisposi.on char(1), @UserLogin varchar(15) AS
SET NOCOUNT ON
DECLARE @TranType varchar(8) DECLARE @ErrMsg varchar(100) DECLARE @DBID int DECLARE @DBNAME sysname
DECLARE @MEPS_ORGANIZATION_ID int
SELECT @DBID = DB_ID(), @DBNAME = DB_NAME(), @MEPS_ORGANIZATION_ID = (SELECT MEPS_ORGANIZATION_ID FROM MEPS_ORGANIZATION_LOOKUP WHERE MEPS_CODE = @MEPSIDCode)
IF @MEPS_ORGANIZATION_ID IS NULL BEGIN SET @ErrMsg = 'Invalid MEPS Code entered. MEPS ID not found.' RAISERROR (@ErrMsg, 16, 1, @DBID, @DBNAME) RETURN END
IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM CANDIDATE_MEDICAL_EXAM CME WHERE CME.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = @MarineCandidateId AND CME.MEDICAL_EXAM_TYPE = 'INSP' AND CME.MEDICAL_EXAM_DATE = @MedicalExamDate) BEGIN --- DEFINE THE TRANSACTION TYPE SET @TranType = 'upda.ng'
--- UPDATE THE MEDICAL EXAM UPDATE CANDIDATE_MEDICAL_EXAM SET MEPS_ORGANIZATION_ID = @MEPS_ORGANIZATION_ID, HEIGHT = @Height, WEIGHT = @Weight, MEDICAL_DISPOSITION = @MedicalDisposi.on, USER_LOGIN = @UserLogin, UPDATE_DATE = GETDATE() WHERE MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = @MarineCandidateId AND MEDICAL_EXAM_TYPE = 'INSP' AND MEDICAL_EXAM_DATE = @MedicalExamDate END ELSE BEGIN --- DEFINE THE TRANSACTION TYPE SET @TranType = 'adding'
--- INSERT THE MEDICAL EXAM INSERT INTO CANDIDATE_MEDICAL_EXAM ( MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID, MEDICAL_EXAM_DATE, MEDICAL_EXAM_TYPE, MEPS_ORGANIZATION_ID, HEIGHT, WEIGHT, MEDICAL_DISPOSITION, USER_LOGIN, UPDATE_DATE ) VALUES ( @MarineCandidateId, @MedicalExamDate, 'INSP', @MEPS_ORGANIZATION_ID, @Height, @Weight, @MedicalDisposi.on, @UserLogin, GETDATE() ) END
IF @@ERROR != 0 OR @@ROWCOUNT = 0 BEGIN SET @ErrMsg = 'An error occurred ' + @TranType + ' the medical exam record.' RAISERROR (@ErrMsg, 16, 2, @DBID, @DBNAME) RETURN END
SET NOCOUNT OFF
